data.message: Eminem you are an unpatriotic irrelevant so called rapper.  I can’t stand any music you ever made.  Respect our President or what’s left of your so called fans will vanish!!

replies.message: nah, you're wrong, There are a lot of us that stand with him

Fuck off. This President doesn't Even act like a President or leader. Show respect? Hell no fuck that pile of shit. I even gave the asshole a chance. But Jesus you have to be fucking retarded at this point to not see the last year and that the guy is a opportunistic self serving prick. I said give the guy a chance. Now? I am left with no choice but to say... this guy is the worst human being I have ever seen.
He has plenty of support, we aren't going anywhere
So called fans will vanish? You got that right. he doesnt need the support of those fans. Bunch of fakes
Dominic Remaro seriously what did he do wrong? You said you’d give him a chance and what has he done?
Erik CF  REALLY?  😂😂😂😂
A bunch of liberal snowflakes!!!
Freedom of Speech "B" now let's see what Donald has to say. Ohhh, lol nobody wants to hear D.T.s B.S. right !
Erik CF fuck yeah!!!
He’s your president, another one he has no respect for, you’re a woman and he doesn’t respect women

I'm not even traditionally liberal,  i just feel that while policy wise he has decent ideas, Trump alienates a lot of the people in the country. As president he should do his best to represent the breadth of his citizens, not just the straight white man
Jeremy Messina, you must be living under a rock. Lol
Whenever I hear someone say show Trump some respect

I am a liberal military veteran with several conservative ideals. The president of the united states is supposed to represent the people, not himself. As long as the cheeto man continues to run to twitter and throw a temper tantrum like a 14 year old girl whenever someone doesn't like him he will continue to be a major problem in this country. I support the constitution, the people of the united states, but I can't fucking stand the government. I didn't like Obama by any means, but at least he never ran to twitter than threw a fit because someone doesn't like him. Fuck ANY politician that puts him or herself before the people of this once great country. The people of this country are what makes this country great, not the president.

You are calling others snowflakes and you are the one crying about someone expressing his rights to free speech. Eminem's fans are not going anywhere. Trump is not this country. You can love this country and hate the moron who runs it. You freedom hating communist. Go back to your safe space snowflake.
yeah all 90 million of them... lollll
You liberals are a bunch of scumbags.
Why are you so mad...? So funny
Not mad!  Think you all are hilarious!  Eminem means nothing to me.  Liberals keep me laughing!  😂😂😂😂
I think we need to bring back death for treason stating with Eminem. Neoliberals next.
Right after conservative christians.
